summary: The diff adds deployment/verification scripts and a LIVE_URL placeholder file, and modifies frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md, but it does not provide an actual stable production HTTPS URL nor clear evidence of a completed mainnet deployment. The DEPLOYMENT.md content shown is truncated and appears incomplete in the excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the existing app as a production (non-preview) Internet Computer deployment and capture the final stable HTTPS URL that users can open in a browser.
missing_requirements.reason: No stable live HTTPS URL is recorded/provided in the changes, and there is no evidence in the diff summary that an actual mainnet deployment was performed; the newly added LIVE_URL.md has an empty URL section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md to include complete, copy-pastable steps to deploy to the Internet Computer mainnet and to retrieve/confirm the final live HTTPS URL after deployment.
missing_requirements.reason: Although frontend-file-summaries.txt claims DEPLOYMENT.md is complete, the actual DEPLOYMENT.md content included in the diff is truncated and shows an unfinished section ("Start from a clean state:" followed by an empty code block), so complete copy-pastable steps and explicit URL retrieval/verification steps cannot be confirmed from the provided diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added standalone deployment and live URL verification shell scripts (deploy-mainnet.sh, verify-live-url.sh).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asked to update DEPLOYMENT.md and provide the final live HTTPS link; it did not request adding automation scripts.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a separate LIVE_URL.md file to record the live URL.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest required capturing/providing the final stable HTTPS URL but did not request creating an additional documentation file for it (it specifically requested updates to frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/added project tracking metadata in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the deployment/publication requirements; no requirement mentions updating project state metadata.
